name: FUNK!RUNNER
description:
Funk Runner is your simple rhythm-based runner with a dash of funk! Shoot projectiles and collect gems to earn your high score. Dash through visualization bars to try and stay ahead. Get lost in the rhythm and enjoy yourself.

A controller is required to play this game.

TIPS:
1. Player can only dash or jump when fully grounded.
2. Try and get ahead and stay ahead.
3. Lightning and enemy projectiles stun player and prevent dashing temporarily.

Funk!Runner Sprite created by FinalGateStudios - Adventurer's Animations Pack
Pixel Explosion Asset created by J-Robot
